operations.summary: Get the list of Protection Domains.
operations.notes: Get the list of Protection Domains configured in the cluster.

operations.summary: Add a Protection Domain.
operations.notes: A protection domain to be used for Disaster Recovery and Backups.

operations.summary: Get the list of alerts generated on any Protection Domain.
Get list of Consistency groups.
operations.notes: Get list of Consistency groups in the cluster.

operations.summary: Get the list of Snapshots.
operations.notes: Get the list of Snapshots created in Protection Domains.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of DR Snapshots to retrieve

parameters.name: full_details
parameters.description: Whether to include consistency group / vm details

operations.summary: Get the list of events generated on any Protection Domain.

operations.summary: Get list of replications.

operations.summary: Get the Data Protection status for all Protection Domains.
Get list of unprotected VMs in a cluster.
operations.notes: Get list of unprotected VMs in a cluster that can participate in Nutanix native Backup and DR.

operations.summary: Delete a Protection Domain.
operations.notes: Mark a Protection domain for removal. Protection domain will be removed from the cluster when all outstanding operations on it are cancelled.

operations.summary: Get a Protection Domain.
operations.notes: Get a Protection Domain with the specified name.

parameters.name: metro_avail
parameters.description: Whether to include only Metro Availability related protection domains

operations.summary: Activate a protection domain
operations.notes: Activate a protection domain with the specified name.

operations.summary: Get the list of alerts generated on a specified Protection Domain.
Get list of Consistency groups in a Protection Domain.
operations.notes: Get list of Consistency groups in a specified Protection Domain.

operations.summary: Deactivate a protection domain.
operations.notes: Deactivate a protection domain. If you delete this protection domain after this, it will destroy all the VMs and VGs protected in this protection domain.

operations.summary: Get the list of Snapshots in a Protection Domain.
operations.notes: Get the list of Snapshots created in a specified Protection Domain.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of DR Snapshots to retrieve

parameters.name: full_details
parameters.description: Whether to include consistency group / vm details

operations.summary: Get the list of events generated on a specified Protection Domain.
Migrate an active Protection Domain to a DR site.
operations.notes: Mark the specified Protection domain as inactive and failover to the given Remote Site.

parameters.name: skip_vm_mobility_check
parameters.description: Flag to specify whether mobility check has to be skipped

operations.summary: Add a out of band snapshot schedule in a Protection Domain.
operations.notes: Add a out of band(i.e one time) snapshot schedule in a Protection Domain having specified name.

parameters.description: A Out of band snapshot schedule instance

operations.summary: Get the list of Out-Of-Band schedules in a Protection Domain.
operations.notes: Get the list of Out-Of-Band schedules in a Protection Domain with the specified name.

operations.summary: Delete a Out-Of-Band schedule.
operations.notes: Delete a Out-Of-Band schedule having specified id.

operations.summary: Get list of pending actions in the Protection Domain.
operations.notes: Get list of pending actions in the specified Protection Domain.

operations.summary: Get list of pending replications in the Protection Domain.
operations.notes: Get list of pending replications in the Protection Domain with the specified name.

operations.summary: Add Virtual Machines to a Protection Domain.
operations.notes: Add Virtual Machines to a Protection Domain to enable Backup and disaster recovery.

operations.summary: Get list of replications in a Protection Domain.
Rollback Virtual Machines and/or NFS files.
operations.notes: Rollback Virtual Machines and/or NFS files in a Protection Domain to a given Snapshot

operations.summary: Rollback an active Protection domain.
operations.notes: Rollback the specified active Protection domain to a given snapshot.

operations.summary: Retrieve all snapshot schedules from a Protection Domain.
operations.notes: Retrieve all snapshot schedules from the specified Protection Domain.

parameters.name: timezone_offset
parameters.description: Timezone offset in seconds w.r.t GMT

operations.summary: Add a snapshot schedule to a Protection Domain.
operations.notes: Add a snapshot schedule to the specified Protection Domain.

operations.summary: Restore Virtual Machines and/or NFS files.
operations.notes:
Restore Virtual Machines and/or NFS files in a Protection Domain to a given Snapshot. This returns a ‘File Group UUID’ through which the restored entities can be managed. The assumption is that such restored entities are short lived and have to be deleted explicitly. The APIs under ‘/file_groups’ namespace provide such management APIs.

Note that this API addresses a narrower use case and many users of Prism might not find it useful.

operations.summary: Replicate Snapshot.
operations.notes: Replicate the given snapshot in a Protection Domain to a given remote site

operations.summary: Get the stats for a specified Protection Domain.
operations.notes: If start time and end time are included in the query string, then historical stats are retrieved. Otherwise, the latest stats are retrieved.

operations.summary: Remove Virtual Machines from a Protection Domain.
Updates Metro Availability timeout for a specific protection domain.
operations.notes: Updates Metro Availability timeout for a specific protection domain.

operations.summary: Updates Consistency Group for a specific protection domain.
operations.notes: Updates Consistency Group for a specific protection domain.

operations.notes: Change failure handling mode for a protection domain

parameters.description: Protection domain name and Failure handling mode

operations.summary: Disables Metro Availability for a specific protection domain.
operations.notes: Disables Metro Availability for a specific protection domain.

operations.summary: Enables Metro Availability for a specific protection domain.
operations.notes: Enables Metro Availability for a specific protection domain based on VStore and remote site.

parameters.description: VStore name and Remote site name

operations.summary: Promotes to active Metro Availability role for a specific protection domain.
operations.notes: Promotes to active Metro Availability role for a specific protection domain.

operations.summary: Remove all snapshot schedules from a Protection Domain.
operations.notes: Remove all snapshot schedules from the specified ProtectionDomain.

operations.notes: Clear retention policies of specified snapshot scheudule from the specified Protection Domain.

operations.summary: Set retention policies of a snapshot schedule of a Protection Domain.
operations.notes: Set retention policies of specified snapshot schedule from the specified Protection Domain.

operations.summary: Delete a snapshot.
operations.notes: Delete a snapshot of a Protection Domain.

operations.summary: Retain a snapshot.
operations.notes: Retain a snapshot of a Protection Domain.

parameters.description: Retention time in microseconds, If value is less thanthe current epoch time in microseconds, then it will delete this snapshot. To retain a snapshot forever give null or no value in the payload

operations.summary: Abort a replication.
operations.notes: Abort a replication in a Protection Domain.

operations.summary: Update the state of the replication.
operations.notes: Update the state of the replication in a Protection Domain.

parameters.description: One of pause, resume or abort

is_rollup_sched.description: Given schedule is a Rollup Schedule or not

rollup_schedule_uuid.description: UUID that helps identify that cron schedules are part of a rollup schedule.

timezone_offset.description: Timezone offset in seconds w.r.t GMT in which the start time is being specified. Defaults to 0, which is GMT

nfs_files.description: Names of NFS files to be restored
nfs_files.notes: Names of NFS files to be restored.

path_prefix.description: Path prefix to be applied for cloning VMs. It is recommended to not use path_prefix while restoring a virtual machine or volume group.
path_prefix.notes: Path prefix to be applied for cloning VMs.

restore_vm_agnostic.description: Whether to restore VM agnostic snapshot.
restore_vm_agnostic.notes: Whether to restore VM agnostic snapshot

snapshot_id.description: Id of the snapshot to restore entities from.
snapshot_id.notes: Id of the snapshot to restore entities from.

vg_name_prefix.description: Name prefix to be applied for cloning VGs.
vg_name_prefix.notes: Name prefix to be applied for cloning VGs.

vm_name_prefix.description: Name prefix to be applied for cloning VMs.
vm_name_prefix.notes: Name prefix to be applied for cloning VMs.

vm_names.description: Names of VM to be restored.
vm_names.notes: Names of VM to be restored.

vm_uuids.description: Uuids of VM to be restored.
vm_uuids.notes: Uuids of VM to be restored.

volume_group_uuids.description: UUIDs of Volume Groups to be restored
volume_group_uuids.notes: UUIDs of Volume Groups to be restored.

local_retention_period.description: Maximum number of days/weeks/months a snapshot is to be retained locally.

local_retention_type.description: Retention type for local Snapshots i.e. DAYS/ WEEKS/ MONTHS/ NUM_SNAPSHOTS

remote_retention_period.description: Maximum number of days/weeks/months a remote snapshot is to be retained remotely.

remote_retention_type.description: Retention type for remote Snapshots i.e. DAYS/ WEEKS/ MONTHS/ NUM_SNAPSHOTS

app_consistent_snapshots.description: Whether consistency group performs app consistent snapshots

vm_handle.description: Internal data-structure used by Cerebro to uniquely identify a vm Should it be displayed to user?

vm_id.description: Unique identifier of a virtual machine within a Hypervisor.

vm_power_state_on_recovery.description: Power state after vm recovery. Default power state is POWEREDOFF.
enum: Power state at time of snapshot

rollup_schedule_uuid.description: UUID that helps identify that cron schedules are part of a rollup schedule.

actions.description: Possible actions to resolve this alert

chart_queries.description: Charts that are relevant to this cause

has_global_details.description: Whether the alert has global details or not

num_resolved_count.description: Number of times this cause has resolved the alert

parent_cause_id.description: Id of the alert/cause this is a possible cause for

troubleshooting_steps.description: Steps to determine whether this is the cause.

severity.description: This field describes the severity of the alert.

metric_details.description: List of metric details associated with the alert
metric_details.notes: List of metric details associated with the alert

severity.description: Severity level of the alert. Can be INFO, WARNING or CRITICAL
severity.notes: Severity level of the alert. Can be INFO, WARNING or CRITICAL

severity_change_timestamp_in_usecs.description: Time at which the severity level change occurred
severity_change_timestamp_in_usecs.notes: Time at which the severity level change occurred
